sources.title: The Superhuman Framework for Individual + Organizational Success
sources.summary: George B. Thomas created the Superhuman Framework, a practical roadmap for personal and professional success built around 10 core principles called 'the 10 H's'. The framework addresses employee engagement, culture improvement, and bridging personal development with professional growth.
keyPoints: 10 H Pillars: Holistic, Happiness, Hungry (Healthy Hustle), Helpfulness, Humor, Humility, Honesty, Health, Humanity, Holiness
Designed to help growth-focused individuals, teams, and organizations thrive
Focuses on empathy, purpose, and well-being
Addresses employee engagement and reducing turnover
quotes: I want to help solve these big-picture problems...help people not just do their jobs better, but live better, feel better, and be better.

sources.title: HubSpot's Loop Marketing Meets the Superhuman Marketing OS
sources.summary: Comprehensive article detailing how the Superhuman Marketing OS integrates with HubSpot's Loop Marketing framework. Loop provides the tactical process (Express, Tailor, Amplify, Evolve) while Superhuman OS provides the foundational humanity and purpose.
keyPoints: Loop Marketing Four-Stage Framework: Express, Tailor, Amplify, Evolve
Superhuman Marketing OS Four Cornerstones: Purpose, Passion, Persistence, Love
Six Foundational Mindsets: Human-Centric, Value-First, Content-Driven, AI-Assisted, Community-Connected, Experience-Led
Loop gives you the engine, Superhuman OS gives you the compass
quotes: Distribution is undefeated. If your message doesn't reach humans, it doesn't move the needle.
Loop without Superhuman risks becoming 'efficient but hollow'; Superhuman without Loop risks being 'inspiring but slow.'
